entry.title: bustapay BIP :: a practical sender/receiver coinjoin protocol
entry.summary: In this context, a conversation is taking place regarding a protocol used to prevent denial-of-service (DoS) and spy attacks in Bitcoin transactions. The sender of the message expresses concern about the complexity of the process and questions the validity of the anti-DoS/anti-spy tactic used in the protocol. They suggest that simplifying the protocol by dropping the signing in the first step would increase privacy and enforce completion or failure of the transaction. The implementor agrees with this suggestion and emphasizes the importance of keeping the protocol as simple as possible to avoid complications.
